translation.en: [speaking English] She says it is the work... of the barbarian devil king.
translation.de: Sie sagt, es sei das Werk... des barbarischen Teufelskönigs.

translation.en: [man speaking English] Her village was loyal to the rebel Song dynasty.
translation.de: Ihr Dorf war den rebellischen Song ergeben.

translation.en: If one does not submit to the rule of the Khan...
translation.de: Wenn man sich nicht dem Khan fügt

translation.en: this is what happens.
[Maffeo] Gerege!
[Kublai speaking English] The Latins.
Yes, I remember.
But where are the Christian priests you were to bring, hmm?
[Niccolò] Lord Kublai... please accept our remorse.
translation.de: Hoher Lord Kublai... bitte übt Nachsicht.

translation.en: Our priests could not bear the rigors of the journey.
translation.de: Die Priester waren den Strapazen der Reise nicht gewachsen.

translation.en: But we did bring you holy oil from--
translation.de: Aber wir bringen heiliges Öl aus--

translation.en: Your men of God retreat, but this boy advances.
translation.de: Eure Gottesmänner weichen, aber dieser Junge rückt vor.

translation.en: It says very little for your savior. Hmm?
translation.de: Das spricht nicht für euren Erlöser.

translation.en: Loyalty... of a mortal son to a mortal father, Great Khan.
translation.de: Die Treue... eines sterblichen Sohnes zu einem sterblichen Vater, Großkhan.

translation.en: Holy oil from the pontiff who wishes to spread
translation.de: Heiliges Öl vom Pontifex, der im Reich

translation.en: Christianity throughout my lands.
Is this not the same Pope who has called me "the spawn of Satan"?
translation.de: Hat nicht derselbe Papst mich "Ausgeburt des Satans" genannt?

translation.en: I will say this and you will listen.
Christianity is welcome in my kingdom.
translation.de: Das Christentum ist in meinem Königreich willkommen.

translation.en: As is Buddhism...
Judaism... Islam...
and the Eternal Blue Sky of my grandfather, Genghis Khan,
translation.de: und der Ewige Blaue Himmel meines Großvaters Dschingis Khan,

translation.en: descended from a wolf.
So, tell your Pope that he himself must bow before me...
translation.de: Darum sagt eurem Papst, er selbst muss sich vor mir verneigen,

translation.en: and pledge his fealty to me.
As for you merchants...
you crossed ocean and mountain...
the great Takla Makan Desert.
One not many men survive.
Describe for me my desert, hmm?
It is a...
most barren region, Sire.
No water. No life, Lord Khan.
-Not even a bird. -Not even a bird.
translation.de: -Nicht einmal ein Vogel. -Nicht einmal ein Vogel.

translation.en: It is, Great Khan... a sea of death.
translation.de: Sie ist, Großkhan... ein Meer des Todes.

translation.en: Yet very much alive.
At night you hear it.
The shifting sands, they... sing.
Humble apologies, Sire. -He does not yet know the rules of the-- -[Kublai grunts]
translation.de: Verzeihung, Majestät. Er kennt noch nicht die Regeln--

translation.en: Continue.
Voices like... spirits...
trying to lure you off course.
translation.de: die einen vom Weg locken wollen.

translation.en: This is why men die out there.
The Uighurs called it...
You learned the tongue of the Uighurs?
Three years was not long enough to learn it all.
translation.de: Drei Jahre reichten nicht, um alles zu lernen.

translation.en: [speaking English] Of all the lands a traveler passes through...
translation.de: Von den Ländern, die der Reisende kreuzt,

translation.en: which province contains...
in your eye, the most beautiful women of all?
translation.de: sind nach deiner Meinung die schönsten Frauen?

translation.en: I find that all women, no matter from which land...
translation.de: Alle Frauen, egal, aus welchem Land

translation.en: they are all beautiful in their own unique manner.
In Italy, we have a saying...
[speaking English] "The true sweetness of wine...
is one flavor."
You have a clever mind.
For a Latin.
I made one request. It was not for oil.
translation.de: Ich habe um etwas gebeten. Nicht Öl.

translation.en: It was for priests. With this, you failed.
translation.de: Sondern Priester. Darin habt ihr mich enttäuscht.

translation.en: Take your leave.
Go, Latins.
You're banished forever.
You are most correct, Lord Khan.
The boy...
has a clever mind and... excellent perception.
translation.de: ist klug und... von vorzüglicher Auffassungsgabe.

translation.en: He is my son...
and most dear to me.
But if it pleases Your Greatness, you may take him as your man and servant.
translation.de: Aber wenn es Euch gefällt, Eure Hoheit, nehmt ihn als Diener.

translation.en: What do you wish in return?
The opportunity to pay tribute to my Khan from my journeys...
translation.de: Meinem Khan Tribut zahlen zu dürfen von meinen Reisen

translation.en: along the Silk Road.
Father, what are you doing?
Marco, trust this. Be silent.
-I am your son. -[whispering] Be silent.
You wish not the honor of service in the court of the Khan of Khans?
translation.de: Du willst nicht die Ehre, am Hof des Khans der Khane zu dienen?

translation.en: What greater tribute can a man offer than his own flesh and his own blood?
translation.de: Welcher Tribut könnte größer sein als der des eigenen Fleisches?

translation.en: You Latin merchants may engage in trade along my Silk Road.
translation.de: Ihr Lateiner dürft auf meiner Seidenstraße handeln.

translation.en: Ahmad, my Minister of Finance,
will discuss taxation and transit.
Take your leave.
-Marco, you have to trust me. -Father!
-This will not be forever. -Don't do this.
We will secure the trade routes and be back for you.
translation.de: Wir sichern die Handelsrouten und kommen zurück zu dir.

translation.en: And I still want those priests.
translation.de: Ich will noch immer diese Priester.

translation.en: Father! Don't leave me here.
[speaking English] Of all the things I expected to come home to after all these years...
translation.de: Wenn ich nach den vielen Jahren mit allem gerechnet hätte...

translation.en: "Marco." She gave you a fine name.
translation.de: "Marco". Sie gab dir einen schönen Namen.

translation.en: When did she pass?
I was six.
From Jerusalem.
It has guarded my heart for 14 years.
translation.de: Es hat 14 Jahre lang mein Herz beschirmt.

translation.en: Psalms 72:11.
"All kings shall fall before him."
-Where were you? -The Silk Road.
It ends here in Venezia.
It stretches 4,000 miles across the world.
translation.de: Sie erstreckt sich 6500 Kilometer um die Welt.

translation.en: Why did you never send word to Mother?
translation.de: Warum hast du Mutter nie ein Wort geschrieben?

translation.en: It is not simple.
We had an arrangement.
But had I any idea of the birth of a son...
translation.de: Aber hätte ich von der Geburt eines Sohnes gewusst...

translation.en: You have her eyes.
Well, now...
your Uncle Maffeo and I...
we have important business to discuss with the Bishop
translation.de: müssen wichtige Geschäfte besprechen mit dem Bischof,

translation.en: before we set sail again.
[Marco] I will travel with you.
Father. Do not leave me alone again.
translation.de: Vater. Lass mich nicht wieder allein.

translation.en: This is not possible.
You are not prepared for the rigors of the journey ahead.
translation.de: Du bist auf die Strapazen der Reise nicht vorbereitet.

translation.en: -[wind howling] -[priest] Lord, help us!
Lord, help us!
Get over there!
I can help!
You defied me, boy!
translation.de: Du hast dich mir widersetzt, Junge!

translation.en: You do not belong here! Stay away from me!
translation.de: Hier gehörst du nicht hin! Bleib weg von mir!

translation.en: [man speaking English] No, no, no.
[speaking English] Very good.
[priest] This is not what we imagined. We must return to our flock.
translation.de: Das wollten wir nicht. Wir müssen zurück zur Gemeinde.

translation.en: You are not abandoning our factor.
Your Bishop gave you orders.
Then follow us back to Venice...
and bring the Bishop instead.
Uncle, Uncle, these are men of God.
-Godspeed. -Thank you. Thank you.
Enough!
You have no knowledge of our world! Do not act as if you do!
translation.de: Tu nicht so, als wüsstest du in unserer Welt Bescheid!

translation.en: Take your donkey.
Follow the priests back to the ship.
Go home.
[Niccolò] Marco!
[Maffeo] We have lost three days.
[Niccolò] We haven't lost a thing, Maffeo.
The Khan and our trade routes slip away
while you make amends for your fatherly sins.
He is our blood.
Mark my words.
He will gut the foundation of everything we have labored to build.
translation.de: Er macht noch alles kaputt, was wir aufbauten.

translation.en: -Get out. -What?
Get out.
Run!
-[Maffeo] Take cover! -Everyone, run!
Run! Go!
Go! Run!
[Maffeo] Take cover!
[Niccolò] Move! Move! Move!
Were you frightened earlier?
I was not.
I was terrified the first time I left home.
translation.de: Ich war völlig verängstigt, als ich erstmals reiste.

translation.en: Venezia was all I had ever known.
translation.de: Venedig war alles, was ich kannte.

translation.en: Do you know how I persevered?
Knowing just where home was...
translation.de: Weil ich wusste, wo mein Zuhause war...

translation.en: and that I could always return to it.
translation.de: und dass ich dorthin zurückkehren konnte.

translation.en: Do you see those stars there?
The Three Sisters.
The Three Sisters.
If you are ever afraid...
if ever you doubt your place in the world...
translation.de: und zweifelst, was aus dir wird...

translation.en: follow The Three Sisters and they will lead you home.
translation.de: folg den drei Schwestern, sie führen dich heim.

translation.en: My only fear...
is that I might awaken in my bed...
destined to live a common life once again.
translation.de: und müsste wieder ein gewöhnliches Leben führen.

translation.en: The blood of an adventurer courses through your veins.
I can see this.
You will enjoy the greatest adventure of all.
You will meet...
the richest...
most powerful king on the face of this earth.
The Great Kublai Khan.
[Kublai] The Song rebels of Xiangyang...
can no longer cast aside our dominion with impunity.
translation.de: missachten unsere Herrschaft nicht mehr straflos.

translation.en: As my trusted advisors, I seek your counsel.
translation.de: Euch als meine treuen Berater bitte ich um Rat.

translation.en: Jingim.
You will one day sit here where I do now.
Speak to your uncles and cousins who have traveled far.
translation.de: Sprich zu deinen weitgereisten Onkeln und Cousins.

translation.en: Destroying the Song dynasty rebels is wise.
translation.de: Die Rebellen der Song-Dynastie zu vernichten, ist weise.

translation.en: But is it not wiser to let them remain in their Walled City...
translation.de: Ist es nicht weiser, sie in der ummauerten Stadt

translation.en: paying us tribute?
What does my vice regent, Yusuf, say on this matter?
translation.de: Was sagt mein Vize-Regent Yusuf dazu?

translation.en: Prince Jingim is correct.
North China already adores Lord Kublai.
Let South China remain within their Walled City.
translation.de: Soll Südchina in seiner Mauerstadt bleiben.

translation.en: Treat the rebels as a...
cow that we draw milk from...
rather than slaughtering the cow, and receiving no milk.
translation.de: statt sie zu schlachten und keine Milch zu kriegen.

translation.en: [Ahmad] Or silk...
in this case.
The Walled City of Xiangyang... guards the Yangtze River.
translation.de: Die Mauerstadt Xiangyang bewacht den Jangtse.

translation.en: And the Yangtze is the gateway to all China.
translation.de: Der Jangtse ist das Tor nach ganz China.

translation.en: You are the Great Khan of Khans.
You desire a unified China. It should be yours no matter the cost.
translation.de: Ihr wollt ein vereintes China. Es sollte Euch gehören, egal, wie hoch der Preis.

translation.en: The Minister of Finance speaks well.
But this is a matter of security and defense,
not coin and commerce.
Little brother...
Ariq the Strong.
How are things in Karakorum?
Things in the Old Capital
are just as our grandfather, Genghis, would have them.
translation.de: wie es unser Großvater Dschingis gewollt hätte.

translation.en: [Ariq] But there are some in Karakorum who fear
that our Khan is becoming too Chinese... too cultured in his ways.
translation.de: unser Khan werde zu chinesisch... zu kultiviert in seinen Sitten.

translation.en: [Kaidu] Lord Khan...
may your western cousins from the House of Ögödei speak?
translation.de: dürfen deine Cousins aus dem Hause Ögedei sprechen?

translation.en: Does the Great Khan desire to be Emperor of Mongolia...
translation.de: Will der Großkhan mongolischer Herrscher sein...

translation.en: or Emperor of China?
you forget the mandate Grandfather was handed from heaven.
To erase dividing lines from country to country.
translation.de: Die Trennlinien zwischen den Ländern aufzuheben.

translation.en: A mandate to spread our customs...
translation.de: Ein Mandat, unsere Sitten zu verbreiten,

translation.en: our cultures... our very way of life...
to every corner beneath the Blue Sky.
translation.de: in jedem Winkel unter dem blauen Himmel.

translation.en: Only one thing stood in his way, as it now stands in mine.
translation.de: Nur eines stand ihm im Weg, wie jetzt mir.

translation.en: Xiangyang... the Walled City.
I have already sent troops into South China.
They are amassing at this very moment.
My spies tell me that in order to starve the rebels out...
translation.de: Meine Spione teilen mit, dass wir, um die Rebellen auszuhungern,

translation.en: we must cut them off from the farming village of Wuchang.
translation.de: sie vom Bauerndorf Wuchang abschneiden müssen.

translation.en: I am sending horse soldiers to that position.
Jingim...
blood of my blood, will lead the assault on Wuchang.
translation.de: mein Sohn, wird den Angriff leiten.

translation.en: [Kaidu] Jingim...
educated in Chinese ways.
Who better to lead an attack on the Chinese?
[Ariq] Older brother...
if this is a call to war... you will have my horse and bow.
translation.de: wenn das ein Ruf zu den Waffen ist, hast du mein Pferd und meinen Bogen.

translation.en: I will lead our Golden Horde down from the north...
translation.de: Von Norden führe ich unsere Goldene Horde herbei...

translation.en: and into battle with my nephew.
We will crush Wuchang, then take the Walled City.
translation.de: Wir vernichten Wuchang und nehmen die Mauerstadt ein.

translation.en: And by the blood of Genghis...
I will cut their leader's head off and tie it to the mane of my horse!
translation.de: Ich werde den Kopf des Anführers an der Mähne meines Rosses festbinden!

translation.en: Emperor of China?
Emperor of Mongolia?
I will be Emperor of the World!
[Jia Sidao] Empress Dowager.
Rise.
How may the Chancellor ease your pain?
translation.de: Wie kann der Kanzler Euren Schmerz lindern?

translation.en: Tell me the barbarians are no longer marching toward us.
translation.de: Sagt mir, die Barbaren marschieren nicht mehr gegen uns.

translation.en: [Jia Sidao] I will not lie. The Khan's troops advance.
translation.de: Ich lüge nicht. Die Truppen rücken vor.

translation.en: But upon the soul of our Emperor...
I promise, they will never succeed.
translation.de: verspreche ich... sie werden nie siegen.

translation.en: Long live Song empire.
My mantis is great. Do you see?
translation.de: Meine Gottesanbeterin ist großartig. Seht Ihr?

translation.en: He feigns inferiority to encourage his opponent's advance.
translation.de: Er gibt sich schwächer, damit die Feinde angreifen.

translation.en: [Jia Sidao] I paid a visit to the Emperor's bedside.
[Red Brow] How is he?
Quite unwell.
[Red Brow] His legacy will live on within these walls.
translation.de: Sein Erbe wird innerhalb dieser Mauern fortdauern.

translation.en: It will be a sad day... but much more efficient once he's gone.
translation.de: Ein Trauertag... aber vieles wird dann besser laufen.

translation.en: No more mixed messages from an old king to his people.
translation.de: Keine unklaren Worte mehr ans Volk.

translation.en: I will give all orders and all orders will be followed.
Yes, my Chancellor.
And that goes for the Emperor's favorite royal concubine.
translation.de: Auch von der Lieblingskonkubine des Kaisers.

translation.en: Where is your sister?
Doing that for which she is famous.
translation.de: Sie tut, wofür sie berühmt ist.

translation.en: Improving diplomatic ties with the Governor of Suzhou.
translation.de: Verbessert die diplomatischen Beziehungen zum Gouverneur von Suzhou.

translation.en: Do you know this game?
[Mei Lin] How much did you pay my brother for this opportunity?
translation.de: Wie viel habt Ihr meinem Bruder für diese Gelegenheit bezahlt?

translation.en: More porcelain than he's ever seen.
translation.de: Mehr Porzellan, als er je sah.

translation.en: Do not fear, Governor.
This is part of the game you paid for.
-The Danger Game. -[whimpers]
You...
are but a lowly... worm.
[guard] Come.
[Hundred Eyes] You have questions.
[Marco] Just one.
Am I a privileged guest or a prisoner in this hell?
translation.de: Bin ich Gast mit Rechten oder Gefangener?

translation.en: A fiery one.
No wonder the Khan caged you for his own personal amusement.
translation.de: Kein Wunder, dass der Khan dich zur Erheiterung einsperrte.

translation.en: You're blind.
Not as blind as you, boy.
translation.de: Nicht so blind wie du, Junge.

translation.en: No roots.
You have spirit, Latin.
Of the Yin and the Yang, you have an abundance of Yang.
translation.de: Was Yin und Yang angeht, keinen Mangel an Yang.

translation.en: But without Yin, Yang dies on the battlefield.
translation.de: Doch ohne Yin fällt Yang im Kampf.

translation.en: We are all prisoners here.
Prisoners and privileged guests. One and the same.
translation.de: Gefangene und Gäste mir Rechten. Ein und dasselbe.

translation.en: If you are unable to protect yourself in the kingdom...
translation.de: Wenn du dich im Königreich nicht schützen kannst,

translation.en: it is I... who will be killed.
Do you understand?
Good. We begin with roots.
translation.de: Gut. Wir beginnen mit den Wurzeln.

translation.en: [Hundred Eyes] You have been conscripted into the court of Kublai Khan.
translation.de: Du leistest Dienst am Hofe Kublai Khans.

translation.en: For what? I do not know.
-I am Hundred Eyes. -[grunting]
I am kept here to train the Khan's sons... his nobles...
translation.de: Ich trainiere die Söhne des Khans... seine Adligen...

translation.en: his pets.
You shall be tutored in the Mongolian ways of the horse.
translation.de: Du lernst zu reiten wie ein Mongole.

translation.en: You shall be tutored in the great arts of the East...
translation.de: Lernst die großen Künste des Ostens...

translation.en: by those scholars and artisans loyal to Lord Kublai.
translation.de: von dem hohen Herrn Kublai ergebenen Gelehrten und Meistern.

translation.en: Languages and letters.
Hawking and archery.
And in the end... you may discover the answer to your question.
translation.de: Und vielleicht... entdeckst du die Antwort auf deine Fragen.

translation.en: [Kublai] A man found in possession of a stolen horse...
must return it to its owner, add nine horses of the same kind.
translation.de: muss es zurückgeben und noch neun gleiche Pferde dazu.

translation.en: If he is unable to pay this fine...
translation.de: Kann er die Strafe nicht zahlen,

translation.en: his children must be taken instead of the horses.
translation.de: muss er stattdessen seine Kinder hergeben.

translation.en: If he has no children...
then he must be slaughtered like a sheep.
translation.de: wird er geschlachtet wie ein Schaf.

translation.en: That man has no children.
I hear from my Minister of Falconry, you have taken well to the hawks.
translation.de: Wie ich hörte, sagt dir die Falknerei sehr zu.

translation.en: Archery is improving, yes?
Yes, Great Khan.
I, myself, was always a bit clumsy with the making of Chinese characters.
translation.de: Chinesische Zeichen liefen mir selbst nie gut von der Hand.

translation.en: When you and your father crossed Central Asia...
translation.de: In Zentralasien seid du und dein Vater

translation.en: you passed through Badakhshān.
Describe for me, in the way that you do...
how you made the passage, what you saw.
translation.de: wie die Durchreise war, was du zu sehen bekamst.

translation.en: We saw sand.
Rode beasts.
Do you defy me?
Describe for me the land of Badakhshān.
The footing was hard on our beasts.
translation.de: Unsere Tiere fanden nur schwer Halt.

translation.en: The sun very hot.
Take him to the horse grounds. Stuff his mouth with the shit of pigs.
translation.de: Zu den Ställen. Stopft ihm den Mund mit Schweinedung.

translation.en: You enter a gate made of rock...
east of Bukhara...
and begin to ascend into the Pamir Mountains.
translation.de: dann beginnt der Aufstieg zum Pamir.

translation.en: There are great numbers of all kind of wild beasts.
translation.de: Es gibt eine Vielzahl wilder Tiere aller Arten.

translation.en: And the men of Badakhshān...
speak of a breed of horse which is said to be the direct offspring of Alexander's.
translation.de: soll eine Pferderasse direkt auf Alexanders Ross zurückgehen.

translation.en: Odd bit of trivia.
I've always been taken by the audacity of Alexander.
translation.de: Alexanders Wagemut hat mich stets beeindruckt.

translation.en: A great conqueror.
There are 20 cities that bear his name, huh?
I now possess them all.
Do you blame me for your current station in life?
translation.de: Gibst du mir Schuld an deinem jetzigen Leben?

translation.en: No, Sire.
I simply wonder why you kept me.
translation.de: Nur: Warum behaltet Ihr mich hier?

translation.en: I need no reason, Latin.
As my servant...
you will accompany a tax collector as he makes his rounds.
translation.de: begleitest du den Steuereintreiber auf seiner Runde.

translation.en: This will give you a view of my Imperial City and my subjects.
translation.de: So lernst du meine Stadt und Untertanen kennen.

translation.en: You will report back to me, describe what you have seen...
translation.de: Du berichtest mir, was du erlebst

translation.en: as you saw it.
I'm giving you freedom.
But the walls of my kingdom stretch beyond the horizon.
translation.de: Meine Mauern reichen weiter als das Auge.

translation.en: Do you understand?
Yes, Sire.
I give you leave.
I assumed you would be riding to Wuchang by now.
translation.de: Ich dachte, du rittest inzwischen nach Wuchang.

translation.en: The astrologers told you this morning was the most auspicious hour to march.
translation.de: Astrologisch war der Morgen zum Aufbruch am günstigsten.

translation.en: The Confucian advisors said it is better we ride at night.
translation.de: Die konfuzianischen Berater hielten nachts für günstiger.

translation.en: They also believe a war can be won without fighting.
translation.de: Die glauben auch, man könne kampflos einen Krieg gewinnen.

translation.en: Why must they always speak in riddles?
translation.de: Warum sprechen die immer in Rätseln?

translation.en: -"The supreme art of war," Father. -Mmm.
Still...
tomorrow I ride to Wuchang as a Mongol...
translation.de: reite ich morgen als Mongole nach Wuchang

translation.en: and I carry my father's flag.
You are your mother's son, Jingim.
Educated... patient... noble.
There will be a time for all these things in the new dynasty.
translation.de: Für all das kommt in der neuen Dynastie noch die Zeit.

translation.en: I must prepare to ride.
translation.de: Ich muss mich für den Ritt rüsten.

translation.en: My three wives each desire a visit before I go to battle.
translation.de: Jede meiner drei Frauen will vorher noch zu mir.

translation.en: You're also your father's son.
Give to me the nectar... so I keep it when you go...
translation.de: Gib mir den Nektar, damit ich ihn für dich aufbewahre...

translation.en: and give you a son.
-And what if it's a daughter? -[chuckles]
translation.de: Und wenn es eine Tochter wird?

translation.en: Yang the Healer says to do it like this, in the Golden Lotus,
translation.de: Heiler Yang sagt, wenn ich im goldenen Lotussitz empfange,

translation.en: and I shall finally bear you an heir.
translation.de: werde ich dir einen Nachfolger gebären.

translation.en: Yang the Healer will be promoted to the ministry.
translation.de: Dafür wird Yang zum Minister befördert.

translation.en: Tell me...
does your Chinese wife do it like this? Huh?
translation.de: macht es deine chinesische Frau auch so?

translation.en: [woman] Nice. They're so beautiful. You can let it go.
translation.de: Hübsch. Sie sind sehr schön. Du kannst loslassen.

translation.en: Are you ready?
Here we go.
the Venetian.
A pleasure to formally make your acquaintance.
She is my charge, so avert your gaze.
translation.de: Sie ist mein Schützling, also wende deinen Blick ab.

translation.en: She is far past the reach of a foreign merchant's son.
translation.de: Für einen fremden Kaufmannssohn ist sie unerreichbar.

translation.en: I followed the wrong path.
translation.de: Ich war auf dem falschen Weg.

translation.en: -Indeed you did... -[bell tolls]
and the clock tower just struck first bell.
translation.de: und die Turmuhr hat eben eins geschlagen.

translation.en: My apologies to you.
The Governor said the songs they sing about you south of Quinsai are true.
translation.de: Der Gouverneur sagte, dein Ruf südlich von Quinsai habe sich bestätigt.

translation.en: You pleased him greatly.
[Mei Lin] The Emperor's dying.
You must honor his wishes.
Anything he wants.
Make a truce with the barbarians.
That was not what the Emperor desired when he was well and strong.
translation.de: Das wollte der Kaiser nicht, als er gesund und kräftig war.

translation.en: Truce is the dying cry of the weak and the sick.
translation.de: Frieden schließen die Schwachen und Kranken.

translation.en: [Mei Lin] Kublai is too strong.
I worry for my daughter if the barbarians take our city.
translation.de: Fällt die Stadt, ist meine Tochter in Gefahr.

translation.en: Let your Chancellor manage military affairs.
You manage the imperial bed chamber.
Let the Chancellor not forget who it was who won him favor in this court.
translation.de: Möge der Kanzler nicht vergessen, wer ihm am Hof behilflich war.

translation.en: When the strike of the praying mantis breaks the body of the cricket,
translation.de: Dass die Gottesanbeterin mit einem Schlag die Grille zerbricht,

translation.en: it is because of its timing.
Timing, Mei Lin.
Trust me, like my soldiers do.
And worry no more.
When the Emperor is gone, you will still be esteemed in this court.
translation.de: Nach dem Tode des Kaisers bist du am Hof noch hochgeschätzt.

translation.en: [Hundred Eyes] Get up.
Get up.
I did not ask to train you, Latin.
There is no honor in this for me.
Nor did you ask to be left here by a man
who would trade his own son like 2 pounds of spice...
translation.de: von einem, der den Sohn wie zwei Pfund Gewürz verkauft...

translation.en: for the opportunity to open trade routes to the West.
translation.de: für die Öffnung der Handelswege für den Westen.

translation.en: Go ahead, take it.
Let him go, Latin.
Let him go.
Get up.
If you wish to survive here, get up at once.
translation.de: Wenn du hier überleben willst, steh sofort auf.

translation.en: The foreigner has been summoned.
It is quiet.
As it is before a typhoon.
By the Eternal Blue Sky, let us sing from our throats
translation.de: Beim Ewigen Blauen Himmel, singen wir aus voller Kehle,

translation.en: and let them hear the devil that they are about to meet.
translation.de: dass sie den Teufel hören, der sie erwartet.

translation.en: The sons of my father's concubines always speak the loudest.
translation.de: Die Söhne meiner väterlichen Konkubinen sprechen am lautesten.

translation.en: We must attack as Genghis would.
Ariq... he is not there.
What do you mean "he is not there"?
translation.de: Was meinst du mit "er ist nicht da"?

translation.en: [panting] No Ariq.
No Golden Horde.
Just grass and sky.
[Nima] Ah, yes.
Welcome.
Proceed down the hall.
And Master Marco... I will be watching you.
translation.de: Und, Meister Marco... Ich werde Euch beobachten.

translation.en: [Kublai] Enter.
Sire.
Your new quarters are more spacious than the last, no?
translation.de: Ich hoffe, du genießt die von mir gewährte neue Freiheit.

translation.en: Yes, very much. Thank you.
[Kublai] I have a test for you.
translation.de: Ich habe einen Test für dich.

translation.en: You will walk back down the Hall of Five Desires.
translation.de: Du wirst zur Halle der fünf Begierden zurückgehen.

translation.en: These girls are from Kungurat...
highly skilled in the arts of love.
A man who proves his loyalty to me can take whatever he wishes.
translation.de: Wer sich mir ergeben erweist, bekommt, was er begehrt.

translation.en: -You may not. -[women moaning]
Not yet.
Look... but do not touch.
[Chabi] The walls have eyes, Marco Polo.
translation.de: Die Wände haben Augen, Marco Polo.

translation.en: Do you hear them taunt us?
translation.de: Hörst du, wie sie uns verspotten?

translation.en: They mock our blood.
Even without Ariq's army, we should still attack like Mongols...
translation.de: Selbst ohne Ariqs Armee sollten wir angreifen wie Mongolen,

translation.en: or retreat as cowards.
[Jingim] That is no farming village.
How many men did you say we have?
Five hundred?
And down there?
[Byamba] More. Many more.
[Aruka] As your General...
I advise... retreat.
We do not return home until we conquer that village.
translation.de: Wir kehren nicht heim, bevor dieses Dorf erobert ist.

translation.en: Give the command.
